lenders.name: PasadenaSue
lenders.loan_because: during my travels, I have seen how people can accomplish great things with a little help.  I want to help others realize their dreams.  125 loans so far...
lenders.occupational_info: My work helps expand our knowledge about space.  I enjoy it since it potentially benefits everyone.  Education is a gift that can never be taken away.

lenders.name: Eddee
lenders.loan_because: I like to connect with different people, near and far.  A small loan for me might mean a giant step for someone's business.  I wish many blessings and success for all the borrowers!

lenders.name: D-L Family
lenders.occupational_info: setting an example - solving man made problems - being the future

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: Decreasing the disparity between those with a financial surplus and those who have little helps make the world a better, safer, more stable, and more sustainable place.  I believe microcredit to honest motivated borrowers helps facilitate this.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in healthcare by helping to heal and educate those who are ill.

lenders.name: Willy
lenders.loan_because: We want to share our wealth with people less fortunate in this world and the approach of Kiva appeals to us as we can see directly who benefits from our loans. We feel that this method is much better than the traditional aid channels. Only a small fraction of the aid collected results in a lasting improvement in the situation of the receivers.
lenders.occupational_info: Selling technology services to companies that develop new products.

lenders.name: Alberto & Kristy
lenders.loan_because:
we are all in this together. (Kristy) 
everybody deserves an opportunity. (Alberto)
lenders.occupational_info: Alberto works to help people communicate by video around the world. Kristy trains new volunteer editors for Kiva.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great idea to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Bob

lenders.occupational_info: I help people become more effective and more ethical leaders.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: "Whatever you do for the least of these servants of mine, you do unto me."

lenders.name: Toby
lenders.loan_because: I'm inspired by people who have a plan to take a good idea and make money from it, despite adverse circumstances. Especially an artistic idea.

lenders.occupational_info: I attempt to understand how wildlife and humans can coexist. Birds are my specialty.

lenders.name: Sue

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.occupational_info: I sell microscopes

lenders.name: Mary Jane

lenders.occupational_info: My work as a physical therapist in schools is almost too much fun to call work!  I work with students who have physical disabilities and their teachers, making sure they have full access to their school environment.  This could mean making sure they have a desk their wheelchair fits under or working with the student to become more independent in walking.  With young students it often involves play which is why I have so much fun in my work.

lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I work on a boat. Other people on the boat go and get really precise measurements on what the seabed looks like and where everything is, as well as interpreted geological data. Then my group takes all the raw data and cleans it, corrects it, and puts it on maps with the geology information. Our clients tell us where they need information and then they buy the raw data and the maps.

lenders.name: elaine
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of a better way to help people in need help themselves. It's our responsibility to think globally and I thank Kiva for making this possible.

lenders.name: Erika
lenders.loan_because: I believe people deserve the chance to take advantage of opportunities they see and/or create to make life better for themselves, their families, and their communities. Often the biggest--or only--real stumbling block is the capital to get started.
lenders.occupational_info:
I reclaim (digitally) damaged photos to enhance people's connection with their families and the past; I help companies create an image and logo to represent who they are and what they can offer to clients; I do some commercial work photographing products and food for brochures, but aside from that, much of my photo work is an attempt to visually capture/express my view of the world.
I try in all my work to evoke a sense of connectedness. I prefer to work with individuals and small businesses because they tend to have a more personal, relationship-based perspective. That is one reason KIVA appealed to me.

lenders.loan_because: it's a way to support people trying to help themselves, and it's done in a sustainable way.

lenders.name: Feroos
lenders.loan_because: Ms. Feroos Hussein Mtandi is a very devoted and intelligent man and is married. My income is not enough to fulfill the family's needs. A father of two children, Mr. Mtandi also takes care of her mother, who is not fit to work. Her business is making Africa Jewwerly (beaded) then he sells in order to help pay the family's expenses. he learned this trade from her father. he has proven many times her abilities as a good business manager and her dedication to hard work. In light of the success of her business and increasing demand, he needs additional financial means in order to meet the demand of the market. The granting of a loan of $450 will allow her to modernize fabrication techniques of her Factory and to sell them at other markets in the country. This loan will allow her to increase her income and to better help her family.
lenders.occupational_info: Within the Country Tanzania

lenders.name: Véronique

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I visited Nairobi in 2005 on my way to climb Kilimanjaro, and saw first hand the work that Moving Mountains are doing there.  I realized that you don't need to invest huge amounts of money to have a real impact.  This is a great way of making a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help lead global IT projects for a pharmaceutical company.

lenders.name: greenough family

lenders.name: Sarah and Tom

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I come from an immigrant family and appreciate what financial support and others interest can mean

lenders.name: Matthew1930.org
lenders.loan_because: We are called by God to help those less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info:
We wanted to take this opportunity to introduce you to www.matthew1930.org a new ministry designed to support missionaries and others that help the poor and less fortunate around the world.

We want to be a resource to tell the story of your service and aid you in getting any support you may need. With this in mind, please send us a story about your group, pictures and areas of need and we will get it out to our network.

Please consider exchanging links with us. You can get all the information here:
http://www.matthew1930.org/links.htm

Thank you for your time and we look forward to working with you.

God Bless,
Scott Kelly
http://www.matthew1930.org

lenders.name: Ferdi Scheepers
lenders.loan_because: I have been richly blessed and love the opportunity to share some of what I have with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I create effects in animated films at Pixar Animation Studios. I've worked on The Incredibles, Cars, WALL*E, and Toy Story 3. Currently, I'm working on "The Good Dinosaur"

lenders.name: Naesoh
lenders.loan_because: I,as an individual,started up a tomato farm in a rural area 2 years ago with just about 5 US dallars and later 5 of the youths in the area became interested.Later we joined to work together and now we have an area of 0.5 hecters of land.These gives us good hopefor futher expansion to join if psssible with the entire communityof 80 to 95 households spacely settled.As a pastor I used the church as a medium of communication to encourage the people.However,we have a problem of very insuficient capital to put in insecticides and fongicide and other miscelaneous things.Although we some what still initiating the project and with very little capital of 45000 cfa francs($100), we strongly believe that a laon of $12000 could be paid back withinn 12 to 18 months.In addition,we also depend on the natual fertility of the land.
lenders.occupational_info: "COMMUNITY DEVELOPEMENT MICROPROJECT",this will be the best name and description I can give.We strongly believe that our success shall help us advance into creating deep wells and/or taps one day to come. Those are some of our goals.

lenders.name: Ronel Scheepers

lenders.occupational_info: I am a Registered Nurse on a post-surgical floor in a hospital.  I like being a nurse and help people get better.

lenders.occupational_info: I work in a small family owned restaurant with 7 other people.  I am a Chef and Server/Manager.  I also go to the University of Tennessee and I am majoring in Special Education.

lenders.name: Al R.
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great idea to help out people who have a genuine need, and who have the spirit to work hard to better themselves and their families. If a few dollars from me allows someone to buy stock to sell, which feeds their family in the end, I feel like I've made a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a medical device manufacturer, whose purpose is to make life-saving products.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I believe availability of capital is the key to reducing poverty.

lenders.name: Ernest
lenders.loan_because: I have always wanted to make a difference to just one person and I think that KIVA will help me do that.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the Government of Canada in the area of Aboriginal health.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: it's so easy!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Political Economy  Major and Public Policy Minor at UC Berkeley.

lenders.name: Olivia

lenders.occupational_info: I just go to school, keep my grades up, and play a lot of sports.

lenders.name: Francine
lenders.loan_because: KIVA is an amazing grass roots opportunity to make a difference on a global level.

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurship is the key to all sustainable economic and social development
lenders.occupational_info: Finding money for promising businesses, helping them to succeed

lenders.name: stéphane
lenders.loan_because: I think it's the only way to help people, giving is not a solution !

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: i would like people to live like they are in a one big village, helping each other to live quality life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a supermarket in downtown Nairobi, I work for 28 days a month with only 2 days off. I work for 16 hrs a day and the pay is barely enough to take care of my wife and 2 children. I'd like to join my wife in her small trading business and expand it with my business expertise.

lenders.name: Stormy & Tom
lenders.loan_because: We like to help people!

lenders.name: ILoveInky
lenders.loan_because: I want to loan. I loan because i want to help others help themselves. I loan because I want to make a difference. I loan because...
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to do and be the best in the best way I can. XOXO

lenders.name: ERIC
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because i am  a business minded person ... I have learn a lot when i started my business in 1998 in Chicago.
i want to share my experience, knowledge  and resources with others entrepreneurs in the world.
lenders.occupational_info:

PC hardware/software, lab concepts, expertise in operating systems, Networking analytical problem solving, Internet.

lenders.name: Les
lenders.loan_because: lending institutions are too greedy and too selective.
lenders.occupational_info:
I write essays and fiction on a computer. I also publish (http://www.thewordshed.com). Writing sometimes seems as though I'm playing piano, though I don't play piano. 

It would be wonderful to hear from you.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I would rather support others in their goals and dreams than simply "give money away", this way they can use it to build a better future. Everyone needs hope, we are here to help each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my company with financial analysis and planning and communicating the results to the rest of the management/employees.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: Even though it might be a small contribution, it is still a contribution.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people get their medications

lenders.name: Sewodo
lenders.loan_because: I want a better life in people life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in pharmaceutical company. I fix the medical machines.

lenders.name: thomas
lenders.loan_because: Self-reliance is important to everyone. Having a hand up instead of a hand out helps one be self-reliant, thus; "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime."

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: everyone is my neighbor.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to communicate more effectively with others.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: It just feels right trying to help others succeed, knowing that just a little capital can make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a very large store, that sells all kinds of goods.

lenders.name: Nicholas Kristof
lenders.loan_because: I've seen how small loans can transform lives, let families graduate from poverty and especially empower women and give them a measure of equality in their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a newspaper columnist and travel widely in the developing world.

lenders.name: omara
lenders.loan_because: I see this method as one of the most sustainable way to help  fight abject poverty around the world.

lenders.name: Cecilia
lenders.loan_because: this is a wonderful way to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Rudert Family
lenders.loan_because: I think Kiva is a cutting edge concept that allows people to target resources toward and connect with real people
It works.

lenders.name: Elliot
lenders.loan_because: As the son of a small business owner, I profoundly believe in the power of small business and free enterprise to make a positive - and sustainable - difference in people's lives, and in the communities and countries in which they live.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: There is no excuse not to help others when the opportunity presents itself.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a librarian, providing people access to information that will hopefully have a positive impact on their life.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Sarah and Kate
lenders.loan_because: Our family is blessed and we care deeply about others who struggle.
lenders.occupational_info: We go to Montessori school

lenders.name: Stella Scott
lenders.loan_because: A loan is more empowering than giving money away. In the end it means you did it all by yourself, with a little help from your friends. :-)
lenders.occupational_info: Happy feminist and human rights activist with a focus on women and LGBT history. I use my singing to tell stories about lost icons, restoring the tale of historic women and queers most people didn't even know ever existed. More information to be found on my homepage.

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: Here is an opportunity for each of us to share with those who have so little. Keep in mind that this is a hand up,  not a hand out,  and I encourage all who are able to join us in this endeavour.
lenders.occupational_info: Searching for ways to improve the world we live in.

lenders.name: NPA frenchies
lenders.loan_because: we care about our world. We are interested global citizens and want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: we are high school students and work hard at learning and expanding our minds and horizons. We live in a beautiful part of California, on the coast, between the redwoods and the pacific.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: Helping others start and grow business is one of my missions, and this is a great way to help someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a marketing coach.  I help others grow their businesses by low-cost but effective marketing efforts.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to help another human being without the fear of corruption.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: It's only money.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office at the University of North Carolina in Chapel Hill, North Carolina.  My job involves arranging meetings, organizing things, reimbursing people for their travels.

lenders.name: Annie
lenders.loan_because: A co-worker first introduced me to Kiva. After reading about what they do and how easily I could get involved, I signed up. I like the idea of being able to make a small difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Montgomery College Enactus
lenders.loan_because: We, the students of Montgomery College Maryland, want to learn about people in other countries and the lives they live; to help entrepreneurs from diverse backgrounds realize their dreams to be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: Students here at Montgomery College come from over 170 different countries. We strive to learn about one another, our cultures, and our business values. If we can better understand people from other countries, we can improve upon our own ideas about business in a global economy.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: Just doing my part to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been working with my company for 15 years. I have been taking care of their computers and their communications network for example Access to the World Wide Web(Internet).

lenders.occupational_info: I have a company and I write computer programs.  Its fun

lenders.name: catherine
lenders.loan_because: I love you and want you to succeed!

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Singer-songwriter

lenders.name: Justin

lenders.name: Sylvia
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.loan_because: there are too many families whose lives have been torn apart by violence, especially in these recent years. People should be able to sustain themselves fairly, without having to give up the dream of caring for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Our family began the process of building orphanages and medical clinics in war-torn Afghanistan twenty years ago, at the end of the disastrous Soviet invasion. Since then we have returned to Canada, due to a number of incidents which have unfortunately crippled our ability to serve the less-fortunate overseas.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to bless others.

lenders.occupational_info: studying, rowing, and studying.

lenders.loan_because: it helps people.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance

lenders.occupational_info: I use my talents in writing, organization, and computer skills to help maintain business communications and functions, while growing an innovative company focused on health and humanity.

lenders.name: Esther

lenders.occupational_info: I write and test computer code to enhance and maintain web programs.

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.  You know the old proverb, "give a person a fish, they eat for the day.  Teach one to fish, they eat for a lifetime."  Well, I can't teach them all to fish, but I can lend them money for a rod (or net)!
lenders.occupational_info: Environmental educator/education

lenders.name: Kevin

lenders.name: Ryann and Neil

lenders.occupational_info:
Ryann is an online fundraising consultant in the non-profit world.  Her clients are some of the world's most meaningful organizations (Greenpeace, Amnesty International, UNICEF, etc.).  She ceased her PhD studies in Buddhism for this career and never looked back.

Neil is a serial entrepreneur, accidental tourist and freelance consultant.  He is fascinated by the small things in life.

lenders.name: Joya

lenders.name: Steve & Kelsey

Our Model United Nations program's focus is on unresolved problems of the world and international relations.  We participate in local and national conferences in which we simulate the actual United Nations.

lenders.occupational_info: Just like a carpenter takes various materials and puts them together to make a bookshelf or build a house, I put pieces of computer code together to make a working software program.

lenders.occupational_info: I work hard. I am a wife and a mother to five children. I am a foster mom. I have a special needs child who requires a great deal of medical care. I cook, clean, do lot's of laundry. I help my children with their school work. I like to read and go on the internet. I like to cook and do arts and crafts with my children. We like to travel many places and we love to learn about other families, countries and cultures.

lenders.occupational_info: I study social psychology; which a type of social science that is concerned with individuals' thoughts, feelings and behavior as they affect or are affected by other individuals.

lenders.name: Daniela
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should get the chance to fulfil his/her dreams or at least to live a decent life.

lenders.name: Dinner Divas
lenders.loan_because: Because we want to share out of the generosity we have experienced, especially from our families.
lenders.occupational_info: We all do different kinds of work, 2 are graduate students, 2 are Nurses, one works for a museum, one investigates fair labor practices, one is a chef, one is a lady of leisure, one is an Episcopal priest.

lenders.name: Penelope
lenders.loan_because: Because They're worth every penney!!!!

lenders.name: J. Powers
lenders.loan_because: earning your own way is the best social program for everything--health, education, you name it.  To be an entrepreneur isn't an "occupation," and all entrepreneurs together do not constitute a "profession."  Entrepreneurship is the primal human activity of adding real value.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now, I'm a graduate student studying toward my Ph.D. in Architectural History.  Ultimately, I aim to influence my culture so that they build more sanely.

lenders.name: Ling Domenici
lenders.loan_because: I just love to see more people become self-sufficient through organizations like kiva.  Tough time or not, we must move on, so thanks to Kiva to link people together.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a MLM individual business owner with a great company in health supplements.

lenders.name: Johannes
lenders.occupational_info: co-founder of @thirdwaveberlin & @cocities. simple food, fine coffee, city living. everything is interesting to me.

lenders.name: Wolfy
lenders.loan_because: it is a great way to helping other peoples :)
lenders.occupational_info: I'm developing hospital informatic systems

lenders.name: Randy Resnick
lenders.loan_because: We're lucky to be able to help other people on the planet by giving them a chance to self-support and determination. The gift of dignity is priceless.
lenders.occupational_info: Kiva.org  is one of the keys to self-determination, dignity and renewable income.

lenders.name: Alasdair
lenders.loan_because: I have the money and they don't.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Government Relations.

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: I feel this is a wonderful program helping people take action in their lives
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain specifications for a major manufacturing company

lenders.name: Yasmin & Craig
lenders.loan_because:
We must.
It is a small attempt to try and make a difference somewhere, for someone.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes it takes a village.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to.

lenders.name: Rubina
lenders.loan_because: supporting local economies around the world can help bring about economic justice.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who live near toxic chemicals to protect themselves. I also like to write and visit my grandmother in Mexico.

lenders.name: Mara
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: Weaver, working with threads.

lenders.name: Jaireh
lenders.loan_because: Seems like a great idea!

lenders.name: Liisa
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great way to share with others and to help to make the world for at least some people a little better place.

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because: I care about giving back to our world...giving to allow others to have opportunities that otherwise they may not have.  To show my children what giving is all about.

lenders.name: Tyler Willis
lenders.occupational_info: I build tools that companies use in developing their advertising.

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people realizing their potential.
lenders.occupational_info: As freelance musician, I do a lot of modern gospel music, as well as other styles.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: It feels so good to empower people to prosper and create flourishing lives for themselves and their families by extending them a helping hand rather than a hand-out. And it's wonderful that Kiva empowers me to leverage a small amount of money into making a big impact on people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info:
I remodel people's homes to make them nicer to live in. 
After work, I enjoy paddling my kayak along the shores of the beautiful island I live on, near Seattle, Washington.

lenders.name: SW Econ Students
lenders.loan_because: We realize that as American students we are very fortunate.  Loaning with Kiva will demonstrate that a small sum of money can have an immense impact.

lenders.name: Alessandra e Marcello
lenders.loan_because: Quando si può aiutare qualcuno, perchè non farlo?
lenders.occupational_info: Siamo una famiglia!!

lenders.name: julie and Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I see with kiva ALL the money going to the people who really need it. Too many charities take too much of your donation for administrative fees, not so with kiva, Keep up the good work. One person at a time.

lenders.name: Crystal Van Wieren
lenders.loan_because: A positive future for the world depends on individual people coming together in an effort to improve and enrich others' lives. I feel it is part of my duty as a human being and humanitarian to help others and encourage people to do the same.

lenders.name: jane
lenders.loan_because: It is a small way I can share my good fortune in life with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help women take care of themselves to have a healthy pregnancy, safe birth and healthy babies.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I can and it seems right that I should.

lenders.name: Adaeze
lenders.loan_because: i am a vitious girl trying to help myself to be come some thing in life. But i dont have any assistance.that is why i needed help from the (kiva)as soon as i heard of thier good news. Pls help.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a student medicine 200level at university of Nnamdi Azikiwe Awka.Anambra State. Nigeria

lenders.name: Katherine O
lenders.loan_because: I love the Lord and my brothers and sisters across the world.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others to live a better life. I have been lucky enough to live in a country were democracy and free enterprise have helped me to provide for my family. I hope in some small way my loan helps encourage those ideals in other parts of the world and makes some lives better in the process.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the operation of a company that has 650 truck on the road hauling various consumer goods to retailers.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: We all should.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a pediatric and Emergency room doctor.

lenders.name: Jana
lenders.loan_because: I want others to have the opportunity to be creative and fulfill their dreams.

lenders.name: Kenneth
lenders.loan_because: I like to just because.
lenders.occupational_info: Forestry, tree doctor.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: people are important all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach kids to think.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great way to create real positive change in the world.  I like the idea that the money I've committed can be recycled when loans are repaid.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.occupation: teacher; training to be a nurse-midwife

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that everyone in the world needs help sometimes, and they should get it.
Creo que todas las personas del mundo necesitan ayuda a veces, y deben recibirla. 
اعتقد ان الجميع في احتياجات العالم يساعد في 
بعض الأحيان، ويجب أن تحصل عليه
Naamini kwamba kila mtu katika mahitaji ya dunia kusaidia wakati mwingine, na wao wanapaswa kupata.
אני מאמין שכל אדם בעולם צריך לעזור לו לפעמים, והם צריכים לקבל את זה
मेरा मानना ​​है कि दुनिया की जरूरत में हर कोई कभी कभी मदद कि, और वे इसे प्राप्त करना चाहिए
Tôi tin rằng tất cả mọi người trong thế giới cần giúp đỡ đôi khi, và họ sẽ nhận được nó
Je crois que tout le monde dans le monde a besoin d'aide parfois, et ils devraient l'obtenir.
lenders.occupational_info: I help small businesses succeed in social media.

lenders.name: Jeremiah
lenders.loan_because: Instead of a handout, this service rewards perseverance and helps people who want to better their life through hard work and diligence!
lenders.occupational_info: Lawyer

lenders.name: SF Bay Area Supper Club
lenders.loan_because: My name is Tom and I manage a Supper Club of about 20-25 people.  We get to enjoy the incredible bounty of the San Francisco Bay Area by cooking a great feast about every six weeks.  Because we are so blessed, we want to share our bounty with others.  Especially of they are in, or want to be in, the food business.
lenders.occupational_info: Every week, I go to people's homes and cook a week's worth of food for them.

lenders.name: Adam Gullen
lenders.loan_because: I believe Microlending has the ability to improve the living conditions of large numbers of people throughout this world. Many individuals in the more developed nations can afford to help those out who are in need, and I choose to do so.

lenders.name: howard
lenders.loan_because: I want  to make a small contribution to the elimination of  poverty and believe in the bottom-up approach of microfinance.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with wealth find ways to give to those in great need to promote economic development.

lenders.name: Francisco
lenders.loan_because: the best, most permanent changes are typically the sum of many smaller improvements.
lenders.occupational_info: U. S. Coast Guard

lenders.name: Margret
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help people who may just need a few helping hands to help themselves and others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to school children age 10-18.

lenders.name: Lili & Rob
lenders.occupational_info: surface/web designers

lenders.name: Barbara and Bob
lenders.occupation: retired postal worker and retired draftsman
lenders.loan_because: Our granddaughter gave us a Christmas gift to make a loan and we matched it with our funds so we could make 2 loans.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired now, but I taught biology at the University of Minnesota for 38 years

lenders.name: Sue & Chuck
lenders.loan_because: We loan because it's a more efficient way to get needed funds to people who can use them.

lenders.name: Beverly
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate to be able to help another.
lenders.occupational_info: I describe and show the value of arts education.

lenders.name: Lauren and Stephen
lenders.loan_because: This loan was a Christmas gift to us from our Aunt Tricey. We are loaning it because we want to help people help their families.
lenders.occupational_info: We are full time 7th grade and 4th grade students. Our job is to work hard, get good grades to make it to 8th and 5th grade, and eventually to college.

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: when I lived in Congo I saw the need for microfinance.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the director of a MicroLoan initative at St Cloud State University.

lenders.name: Valerie and Geoff
lenders.loan_because: We're all connected, one way or another.
lenders.occupational_info: Valerie develops renewable wind energy projects and Geoff designs houses and buildings.

lenders.name: Julian
lenders.loan_because: After all this years of people given to me their unconditional love, care and trust.  As they did it for me and now is time to give it back.
lenders.occupational_info: Teach Tennis to all types of people. All ages as well.

lenders.name: Sam & Emmie
lenders.loan_because: To those who have been given much, much is expected.  We are so stinkin' blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: Sam teaches 8 year olds in an urban public school.  Emmie lends money to businesses on behalf of a small local bank in Portland.

lenders.name: Peggy Nederlof
lenders.occupation: health consultant, aromatherapist, and feng shui practitioner
lenders.loan_because: This is one way of giving back and showing my gratitude for all that I am blessed with. I love giving direct micro loans to those that need them and are willing to make positive changes in their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping others with their health and well-being

lenders.name: John Dooley
lenders.loan_because: I believe that micro-lending is the miracle cure for poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Teacher, Musician, and student of the world.

lenders.name: Hect, Giz & Fred
lenders.loan_because: it is what I would have someone else do unto me if I were in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and simply travel in my small camper in search of new friends and joyous occasions.

lenders.name: tatsushi
lenders.loan_because: I hope my small money is helpful to something.

I am a japanese software engineer. I can make some programs on windows.
I can't speake english well, but I can understand japanese well.

lenders.loan_because: Think in a social and green way, the social green change is possible  ;-)
lenders.occupational_info: Expanding new ideas and growing projects

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I have benefited from loans myself, and enjoyed traveling in many of the regions I have made loans in.
lenders.occupational_info: I help governments and industry meet environmental laws, to keep our air, rivers, and land clean.
